summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to drainage and wastewater services of Seattle Public Utilities; amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 21.33.030 to adjust drainage rates; amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 21.28.040 to adjust wastewater rates; amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 21.28.260 to clarify the imposition of interest charges on delinquent wastewater accounts; and amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 21.76.040 to revise credits to low-income wastewater and drainage customers.
